description: Compare the French conglutinant and the Latin conglūtināns (the present active participle of conglūtinō); also see the English verb conglutinate and suffix -ant.

adjectives.description: conglutinant (comparative more conglutinant, superlative most conglutinant)

entries.meaning: That cements together, especially that heals a wound by adhering its edges
